#summary MinGW Build Environment
#labels Phase-Design

MPlayer and its libraries are built using [http://www.mingw.org MinGW] & MSYS, a minimal Unix-like shell for Windows require to build libraries on Windows. The GCC version used is 4.6.3.

A complete build environment is made available at the following URL: [http://sourceforge.net/projects/smplayer/files/MinGW MinGW @ Sourceforge]
